record.dc:title: 179BY13 Ledford Island, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 16BY147, an adult male with spatulas (F.S. 2956) to left of pelvis. Square 8R3. Direction SE.
record.wpa:narrative: Adult male in poor condition, extended on back with head to SW. Pit from plowzone filled with dark soil containing flecks of yellow sand. Bones lay on subsoil. Bones in very poor shape. Skull tipped back until teeth highest point, mouth very wide open. Right wrist under right ilium. Left leg rolled outward at knee, head of femur straight up. Bone spatulas lay beside left wrist.
